title: Are you claiming the unused Inheritance Tax allowance (known as the ‘nil-rate band’) of the spouse or civil partner of the person who died?
question: Are you claiming the unused Inheritance Tax allowance of {deceasedName}’s husband, wife or civil partner?
hint1: Everyone has a £325,000 tax free allowance (known as the ‘nil-rate band’) before they must pay Inheritance Tax.
hint2: If {deceasedName} did not use some or all of the allowance when their husband, wife or civil partner died, you can add that remaining allowance to this application

unusedAllowanceClaimed.required: You must select an option to continue
